trans-unit.source: A factory class for creating <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> objects from Windows NT aliases, email addresses, and security identifiers (SIDs).
trans-unit.target: Clase de generador para crear objetos <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> a partir de direcciones de correo electrónico, identificadores de seguridad (SID) y alias de Windows NT.

trans-unit.source: All methods in <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory> are static and no instance needs to be created.
trans-unit.target: Todos los métodos en <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory> son estáticos y no es necesario crear ninguna instancia.

trans-unit.source: The constructor is hidden.
trans-unit.target: El constructor está oculto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration" /> object that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration" /> asociado al <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration" /> object associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory" />.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration" /> asociado al <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration> object is used for changing the standard Active Directory schema properties that the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> class uses.
trans-unit.target: El objeto <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration> se usa para cambiar las propiedades estándar de esquema de Active Directory que usa la clase <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>.

trans-unit.source: The alias string to create the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: La cadena del alias para crear <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> using the specified Windows NT alias.
trans-unit.target: Crea una instancia de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> mediante el alias de Windows NT especificado.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that describes the specified Windows NT alias.
trans-unit.target: Instancia de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> que describe el alias de Windows NT especificado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is a concrete implementation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> abstract class that is used to access Active Directory functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> es una implementación concreta de la clase abstracta <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> que se usa para tener acceso a la funcionalidad de Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Active Directory store is used for storing organizational information for personnel.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, el almacén de Active Directory se utiliza para almacenar la información de la organización para el personal.

trans-unit.source: The main purpose for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is for making queries against such organizational information for business reasons.
trans-unit.target: El propósito principal de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> es realizar consultas de esa información de la organización por razones comerciales.

trans-unit.source: The email address string from which to create the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Cadena de dirección de correo electrónico a partir de la que se creará el <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> using an email address.
trans-unit.target: Crea una instancia de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> con una dirección de correo electrónico.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that describes the specified email address.
trans-unit.target: Instancia de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> que describe la dirección de correo electrónico especificada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is a concrete implementation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> abstract class that is used to access Active Directory functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> es una implementación concreta de la clase abstracta <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> que se usa para tener acceso a la funcionalidad de Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Active Directory store is used for storing organizational information for personnel.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, el almacén de Active Directory se utiliza para almacenar la información de la organización para el personal.

trans-unit.source: The main purpose for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is for making queries against such organizational information for business reasons.
trans-unit.target: El propósito principal de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> es realizar consultas de esa información de la organización por razones comerciales.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> to use to create the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> que se usa para crear <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> using a Windows NT <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea una instancia de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> mediante una clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> de Windows NT.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that describes the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" />.
trans-unit.target: Instancia de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> que describe la clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is a concrete implementation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> abstract class that is used to access Active Directory functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> es una implementación concreta de la clase abstracta <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> que se usa para tener acceso a la funcionalidad de Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Active Directory store is used for storing organizational information for personnel.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, el almacén de Active Directory se utiliza para almacenar la información de la organización para el personal.

trans-unit.source: The main purpose for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is for making queries against such organizational information for business reasons.
trans-unit.target: El propósito principal de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> es realizar consultas de esa información de la organización por razones comerciales.
